text:
The error (you will get an unsupported encoding exception with the
'ISO-8859-8-i' encoding name) was in the logs, but there was a bug preventing
the display of the error page.
It is fixed in the HEAD branch. Nightly for 02/22 will have the fix.

The rest of the bug is INVALID (ISO-8859-8-i is apparently not a valid encoding,
so it won't work, and the error won't be ignored).
